article.title: General Dynamics Wins Military Sealift Contract
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The U.S. Navy's Military Sealift Command has awarded General Dynamics American Overseas Marine a $27.2 million operations and maintenance services contract. Under the contract, the company will provide full service operations and maintenance for seven Navy large, medium-speed, roll-on/roll-off vessels. Services include crewing, engineering, maintenance, procurement and provisioning.
